Package com.mygame.entities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrow
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to arrow
    Cursor
    Consists of current cursor position
    Gold
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to gold that is dropping from dead enemies
    Hud
    Is responsible for displaying information like current gold quantity of player's character on screen, it uses it's own camera (hudCam), uses scene2d
    Item
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to item
    Player
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to player
    Slime
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to slime which is an enemy to player's character
    Sprite
    All displayable objects should inherit from this class, contains all elements needed for creating physics object in box2d's world, also contains hash map for animations and current animation that will be displayed during render
    TextEvent
    Used for displaying dynamic text that is fading (for example used for displaying damage dealt on screen)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Player.State
    Player's current state
    Sprite.Direction
    Contains string name of 8 directions
